attributes.action: Relieve Sadiq Khan of his duties as Lord Major of London.
attributes.additional_details:
Sadiq Khans allowance of the effigy of Donald Trump to be raised above Britain is not a representation of the populace and is a disgrace to not only our country but also detrimental to our relationship to world leaders, never mind childish.
Personal feelings should not be portrayed by such a professional representative of our country.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khans allowance of the effigy of Donald Trump be raised above Britain is not a representation of the populace, is a disgrace and detrimental to our relationship to world leaders. Personal feelings should not be portrayed by such professional representative of our country.

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
